attributes.action: Provide every person of 70 years of age with a Grey Squirrel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are very useful for jobs around the house; I managed to get my piano upstairs with my grey squirrel last week; mind you I had to use a whip! But the brave little fellow did manage to get all the way up two flights of stairs. I think this is a super idea for keeping these little grey ASBO rascals from harrasing the cute red squirrels!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
